description: This story playfully explores why a snowman in Kyoto refuses to melt, revealing his discovery of Zen.
title: The Zen Snowman
n_1: In the tranquil gardens of Kyoto, Yuki encounters a snowman standing amidst blooming cherry blossoms.
c2_1: I am in Zen; the warmth does not bother me.
n_2: Yuki looks puzzled, sitting next to the snowman in meditation.
c2_2: Just feel the moment, let go of the heat.
n_3: They meditate together, the snowman remains solid.
c2_3: Zen is not just found, it is felt.
n_4: As the sun sets, the snowman still stands, Yuki smiles in realization.
